name: PeteAngel
_source: speak;Pete;Glasses, you traitor!|I won't stand for mutiny!
speak;Angel;I'm under new management, girl.|Plus, take a bath. You reek...
speak;Pete;Yar har! The only thing I smell of, is victory!
speak;Angel;Is that what we're calling it now...
speak;Pete;You won't be laughin' when me axe is lodged in your skull, har!
